Package com.example.android.funkytasks

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Bid
    This is a constructor for all the bids in the project.
    BidListViewAdapter
    This adapter dictates how the bids should be displayed on screen.
    BidTest
    Created by fc1 on 2018-02-21.
    BuildConfig  
    CreateTaskActivity
    This activity allows a task requester to create a new task and post it to the server.

    Created by jimi on 2018-03-15.
    DashboardProviderTask
    This activity displays the tasks to the task provider.

    Created by ${fc1} on 2018-03-19.

    This class displays the tasks and their bids to a requester.

    Created by ${fc1} on 2018-03-17.

    This activity allows a user to edit a task

    Created by ${fc1} on 2018-03-16.
    EditProfileActivity
    This activity allows a user to edit their profile information
    EditProfileActivityTest
    Created by ${fc1} on 2018-03-15.
    ElasticSearchController
    The controller for our Elastic Search functions for the project
    ElasticSearchController.deleteBid
    Searches for and deletes a bid
    ElasticSearchController.deleteTask
    Deletes a task from the server
    ElasticSearchController.deleteUser
    Deletes a user from the database
    ElasticSearchController.GetAllProviderTask
    Returns all the users who are fulfilling a task
    ElasticSearchController.GetAllTask
    Returns all the tasks in the server
    ElasticSearchController.GetAllUsers
    Returns all the users in the database
    ElasticSearchController.GetBidsByBidder
    Returns all the bids that one user has placed
    ElasticSearchController.GetBidsByRequester
    Returns the bids posted by one particular user
    ElasticSearchController.GetBidsByTaskID
    Returns all the bids placed on a certain task
    ElasticSearchController.GetDefaultSearchTaskList
    If a user doesn't know what to search for, it displays all tasks posted by other users
    ElasticSearchController.GetTask
    This function searches for and returns a task
    ElasticSearchController.GetUser
    Gets the user from the server
    ElasticSearchController.PlaceBid
    Posts a bid to the server
    ElasticSearchController.PostTask
    Posts a task to the server
    ElasticSearchController.PostUser  
    ElasticSearchController.searchTask
    Searches the database for a particular task
    ElasticSearchController.updateBid
    Locates and updates a bid in the server
    ElasticSearchController.updateTask
    Updates a task in the server
    ElasticSearchController.updateUser
    Locates and updates a user's information
    ExampleInstrumentedTest
    Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
    ExampleUnitTest
    Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
    GlobalVariables
    This class holds global variables for the entire project.
    ListViewAdapter
    An adapter for the list view items to properly display the tasks
    LoginActivity
    This activity allows a user to login

    MyTasksActivityTest
    Created by ${fc1} on 2018-03-19.
    PlaceBidDialogFragment
    This fragment allows a user to place a bid on a task
    ProviderBiddedTaskAdapter
